alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 09 at 2:57PM AKDT until August 09 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR MIDDLE TANANA VALLEY... * AFFECTED AREA...Middle Tanana Valley. * TIMING...Until 10 PM AKDT this evening. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...Southwest 5 mph or less. * HUMIDITY...As low as 40 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the lower 70s. * IMPACTS...Frequent lightning could cause new fire starts. Thunderstorms will cause gusty and erratic winds.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
